verses.verse: לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִזְבַּח֩ <S%H2076><s%> Thou shalt not sacrifice לַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> [any] bullock וָשֶׂ֗ה <S%H7716><s%> or sheep אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has בוֹ֙ מ֔וּם <S%H3971><s%> wherein is blemish כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> any דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> act רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> is a תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <S%H8441><s%> for that [is] an abomination יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> If there be found בְקִרְבְּךָ֙ <S%H7130><s%> among בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> you within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָ֑ךְ אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee man אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> or woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> that hath wrought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> in transgressing בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> gone וַֽיַּעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לָהֶ֑ם וְלַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ ׀ <S%H8121><s%> them either the sun א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לַיָּרֵ֗חַ <S%H3394><s%> or moon א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> or any of the host הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not צִוִּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> which I have not commanded

וְהֻֽגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> And it be told לְךָ֖ וְשָׁמָ֑עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> thee and thou hast heard וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <S%H1875><s%> [of it] and enquired הֵיטֵ֔ב <S%H3190><s%> diligently וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> and behold [it be] true נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> certain הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> [and] the thing נֶעֶשְׂתָ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> is wrought הַתּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> [that] such abomination הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וְהֽוֹצֵאתָ֣ <S%H3318><s%> Then shalt thou bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that man הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אוֹ֩ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> or that woman הַהִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָ֠שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> which have committed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> thing הָרָ֤ע <S%H7451><s%> that wicked הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> unto thy gates אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [even] that man א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> or that woman וּסְקַלְתָּ֥ם <S%H5619><s%> and shalt stone בָּאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> them with stones וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> till they die

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פִּ֣י ׀ <S%H6310><s%> At the mouth שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> of two עֵדִ֗ים <S%H5707><s%> witnesses א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> or three עֵדִ֖ים <S%H5707><s%> witnesses יוּמַ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> shall he that is worthy of death הַמֵּ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּמַ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> he shall not be put to death עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פִּ֖י <S%H6310><s%> [but] at the mouth עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> witness אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> of one

יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> The hands הָעֵדִ֞ים <S%H5707><s%> of the witnesses תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בּ֤וֹ בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> shall be first לַהֲמִית֔וֹ <S%H4191><s%> upon him to put him to death וְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> the hands כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people בָּאַחֲרֹנָ֑ה <S%H314><s%> and afterward וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If יִפָּלֵא֩ <S%H6381><s%> too hard מִמְּךָ֨ <S%H4480><s%> is too דָבָ֜ר <S%H1697><s%> If there arise a matter לַמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> for thee in judgment בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between דָּ֨ם ׀ <S%H1818><s%> between blood לְדָ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> and blood בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> between plea לְדִ֗ין <S%H1779><s%> and plea וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> and between נֶ֙גַע֙ <S%H5061><s%> and between stroke לָנֶ֔גַע <S%H5061><s%> and stroke דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> [being] matters רִיבֹ֖ת <S%H7379><s%> of controversy בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H8179><s%> within thy gates וְקַמְתָּ֣ <S%H6963><s%> aloud וְעָלִ֔יתָ <S%H5927><s%> and get thee up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> into the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בּֽוֹ׃

וּבָאתָ֗ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and unto הַשֹּׁפֵ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> and unto the judge אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> that shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> those וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> and enquire וְהִגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they shall shew לְךָ֔ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thee the sentence הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment

וְעָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt do עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> to the terms הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> of the verdict אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יַגִּ֣ידֽוּ <S%H5046><s%> shall shew לְךָ֔ מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> which they of that place הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> thee and thou shalt observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יוֹרֽוּךָ׃ <S%H3384><s%> according to all that they inform

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> According פִּ֨י <S%H6310><s%> According to the sentence הַתּוֹרָ֜ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יוֹר֗וּךָ <S%H3384><s%> which they shall teach וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and according הַמִּשְׁפָּ֛ט <S%H4941><s%> thee and according to the judgment אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> which they shall tell לְךָ֖ תַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> thee thou shalt do לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָס֗וּר <S%H5493><s%> thou shalt not decline מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> from the sentence אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַגִּ֥ידֽוּ <S%H5046><s%> which they shall shew לְךָ֖ יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> thee [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאל׃ <S%H8040><s%> nor [to] the left

וְהָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that will do בְזָד֗וֹן <S%H2087><s%> presumptuously לְבִלְתִּ֨י <S%H1115><s%> not שְׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> and will not hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest הָעֹמֵ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> that standeth לְשָׁ֤רֶת <S%H8334><s%> to minister שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> nor אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשֹּׁפֵ֑ט <S%H8199><s%> or unto the judge וּמֵת֙ <S%H4191><s%> shall die הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> even that man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> you וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> and thou shalt put away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> from Israel

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear וְיִרָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> and fear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and will not יְזִיד֖וּן <S%H2102><s%> and do no more presumptuously עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> When thou art come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָ֔ךְ וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֖הּ <S%H3423><s%> thee and shalt possess וְיָשַׁ֣בְתָּה <S%H3427><s%> it and shalt dwell בָּ֑הּ וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> therein and shalt say אָשִׂ֤ימָה <S%H7760><s%> I will set עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> over מֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> a king כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> over me like as all the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיבֹתָֽי׃ <S%H5439><s%> that [are] about

שׂ֣וֹם <S%H7760><s%> Thou shalt in any wise תָּשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> set עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over מֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [him] king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> over thee whom the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בּ֑וֹ מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> [one] from among אַחֶ֗יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brethren תָּשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> shalt thou set עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over מֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> over thee thou mayest לָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> not set עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a נָכְרִ֔י <S%H5237><s%> foreigner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> over thee which [is] not thy brother הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

רַק֮ <S%H7535><s%> but לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יַרְבֶּה־ <S%H7235><s%> But he shall not multiply לּ֣וֹ סוּסִים֒ <S%H5483><s%> horses וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never יָשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> to return אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> to himself nor cause the people מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of הַרְבּ֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> to the end that he should multiply ס֑וּס <S%H5483><s%> horses וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> forasmuch as the LORD אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> hath said לָכֶ֔ם לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall never תֹסִפ֗וּן <S%H3254><s%> unto you Ye shall henceforth לָשׁ֛וּב <S%H7725><s%> return בַּדֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> no more that way הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again
